description:
Boa Hancock`s illness threatens to sabotage Luffy`s rescue mission; however, the Snake Princess just can`t say "no" to the rubberman, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`amour est un ouragan ! Hancock succombe à la passion !
Love Is a Hurricane! Love-Love Hancock!
恋はハリケーン! メロメロハンコック
